name: Yoga Classes
description: Structured yoga sessions led by experienced instructors, teaching various yoga styles, poses, breathing techniques, and meditation practices.

name: Yoga Therapy
description: Personalized sessions with trained therapists using yoga practices to address specific health concerns and improve physical and mental well-being.

name: Holistic Nutrition Counseling
description: Dietary guidance and nutrition planning incorporating yoga principles, tailored to an individual's health goals and lifestyle.

name: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Guided meditation sessions focused on cultivating mindfulness, reducing stress, and enhancing mental clarity and presence.

name: Ayurveda Consultation
description: Assessment of an individual's constitution (dosha) and personalized recommendations for diet, lifestyle, and herbal remedies based on Ayurvedic principles.
